About.title: About Me
About.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web and mobile technologies. I love creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications that make a difference. With experience in React, React Native, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, and Laravel, I bring ideas to life through clean, maintainable code.
